meanings.definition: Capable of operating with other systems or devices without special effort
meanings.sent1: The new software update made the devices interoperable with each other.
meanings.sent2: The interoperable components seamlessly connected to form a complete system.
meanings.sent3: It was a relief to find the two systems were interoperable, saving time and frustration.
meanings.sent4: Their teamwork was so interoperable, it was like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The interoperable design allowed for easy integration and smooth operation.
